dashboard.description: Discourse dashboard focused on DevRel metrics by Bitergia.
dashboard.panelsJSON: [{"version":"7.9.1","gridData":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":48,"h":14,"i":"1"},"panelIndex":"1","embeddableConfig":{"title":"Posts Created"},"title":"Posts Created","panelRefName":"panel_0"},{"version":"7.9.1","gridData":{"x":0,"y":14,"w":48,"h":20,"i":"2"},"panelIndex":"2","embeddableConfig":{"title":"Posts (Questions and Answers): Top 30 Contributors"},"title":"Posts (Questions and Answers): Top 30 Contributors","panelRefName":"panel_1"},{"version":"7.9.1","gridData":{"x":0,"y":34,"w":48,"h":11,"i":"3"},"panelIndex":"3","embeddableConfig":{"title":"Discourse Activity, Active Authors, and Posts"},"title":"Discourse Activity, Active Authors, and Posts","panelRefName":"panel_2"}]
dashboard.title: Discourse DevRel

visualization.title: devrel_discourse_posts_rolling_average
visualization.visState:
{"title":"devrel_discourse_posts_rolling_average","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index=discourse, timefield=grimoire_creation_date).label('Posts / day (Questions and Answers)'),

.es(index=discourse, timefield=grimoire_creation_date).mvavg(window='30d').label('Posts: 30d Rolling Avg.'),

.es(index=discourse, timefield=grimoire_creation_date).mvavg(window='60d').label('Posts: 60d Rolling Avg.'),

.es(index=discourse, timefield=grimoire_creation_date).mvavg(window='90d').label('Posts: 90d Rolling Avg.')","interval":"1d"},"aggs":[]}

visualization.title: devrel_discourse_help
visualization.visState:
{"title":"devrel_discourse_help","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"markdown":"This dashboard focuses on Discourse activity, and active authors in different timeslots

**Posts Created**: Number of new posts by month 30/60/90 day rolling avg posts/day. This calculates the numbers per day, as rolling averages are per day too. Metric says posts: a post is either a question or an answer (this can be easily modified to count only one of them or to count them separately).

**Posts**: Top 30 contributors in the last 30/60/90 days (excluding any automated tooling).
* To filter bots there is a filter on top of the dashboard.
* Links to Hatstall are provided within the tables to allow to editing profiles in case there are unmerged profiles or bots that are not marked as such.
* There are 3 tables, one per each time interval."},"aggs":[]}
